predicate: The bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config must match with the bwp-Id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference

valid: bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config is 1 and bwp-Id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference is 1
invalid: bwp-id in bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config is 1 and bwp-Id in csi-im-resourcesforinterference is 2

notes: The evidence explicitly states that the bwp-Id in the CSI-ResourceConfig (which is part of csi-im-resourcesforinterference) is the same value as the bwp-Id in the bwp-dedicated_pdsch-config.
